channel.title: Publications on B.USOC - Belgian User Support and Operations Centre
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on B.USOC - Belgian User Support and Operations Centre

item.title: Publications
item.author: social_media@busoc.be (B.USOC)
item.description: We have made an inventory of the B.USOC authors publications from 2001 until now and you can access this here . A list of B.USOC publications is also available on orfeo from KBR 2001 Exobiology: Martian Environmental Conditions 2003 STERILISATION PROPERTIES OF THE MARS SURFACE AND ATMOSPHERIC ENVIRONMENT 2004 Telescience and Space Missions Operations at the Belgian User Support and Operation Centre Le vol habité vers Mars : une étude de l’ESA
